comment: Very fruity on the nose. Bold across the pallet. Pleasant entry, big fruit in the middle, and woody on the finish. Almost a bit too woody (think nuts) for my and I don’t like nuts. Pleasant warmth on the finish that is deceiving let mild for the proof.p
nice nip of honey and bananas. a little sweet for my tastes
Smooth up front, toffee, buttery on the nose. Spice on palate. Honey with hint of sweet finish. Light on the grass.
